CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-Pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON , the GPE region .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings in ORG ( Краснолуцький міський суд PERSON області ) against his employer , the ORG “ PERSON ” ( “ the ORG , ” ORG “ PERSON ” ) , for salary arrears and other payments . At the material time the ORG owned PERCENT of the ORG 's shares . The ORG was therefore subject to the PERSON of DATE “ on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property . ”
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant LAW . This judgment was not appealed against and became final .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби ORG міського управління юстиції ) initiated the enforcement proceedings in relation to this judgment .
CARDINAL . The judgment was enforced on DATE .
CARDINAL . A description of the relevant domestic law can be found in ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
